phase3.gui.ColorSelector



class ColorSelector: org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite.Composite;
The ColorSelector is a Composite that holds to simple Widgets, a Label and a Canvas. Clicking on the Canvas will open a Dialog that will all the user to change the color.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 10, 2014

this(Shell parent, ColorManager colorManager);
Creates a new ColorSelector.

Params:
Shell parent The Shell containing this ColorSelector.
display The Display the Shell is on.

Date:
April 10, 2014

Color getActiveColor();
Returns:
The active Color being used.

Date:
April 16, 2014
